review:
The doctor is very skilled at his work, thus the procedure is done quickly and efficiently. 

They have the latest machines which aid the treatment. 

 The ambience  of the clinic is nice and the atmosphere at the clinic is relaxed and friendly- taking off the pressure of the dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Nishant Gandhi is a highly experienced and skilled Dental surgeon. I had heard appreciative reviews about him from my cousin who is also a dentist. And all that stood true when I received his treatment myself. 

Dr Nishant Gandhi is amiable and makes you feel comfortable during the treatment and understands your concerns readily. He also tried to be friends with my 3-year-old nephew who accompanied me at my first visit just so that my nephew feels comfortable in the new environment. Dr Gandhi has the latest healthcare technology and equipments available at his clinic which makes the treatment journey quite smooth and less time consuming. Thank you, Dr Gandhi!

Ms. Helen at the reception is extremely helpful and accomodating to your schedules and concerns. She is indeed brings in positivity to the entire treatment experience. She keeps a good follow up to the treatment. Very sweet lady. 

The other assistants, staff, technicians are courteous and professional.

The ambience of Dr Gandhi's clinic is calm and pleasant. Waiting time is very less at the clinic; and even if you have to wait for 5 minutes, that is not an issue at all because the clinic environment is serene.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Excellent ambience with all modern instruments.
Friendliness and taking care nicely.
Nicely examined and decision making carried out for very short duration.Accordingly the wisdom tooth which was for root cause to visit Dr.Nishant was extracted nicely by experienced dental surgeon under his planning.post operative medicines were suggested absolutely which were absolute.
The missing teeth were treated and replaced with best zerconium casted teeth after taking measurements and necessary polishing and filing for the adjacent teeth for cementing cap.

Same were fitted with lifetime warranty.

I am very pleased for quick decision making and necessary treatments within very short duration of my stay in Mumbai.

Wishing him and team all success ahead.Same relationship anticipated for future consultancy.

We need more doctors like Dr. Nishant. Thank you for your help and support doctor and helping me resolve my long pending dental issues. Super Happy üòå

review:
Very courteous and patient with queries.  Also highly attentive to work on hand. Just one dental chair, and full focus on only one patient at a time, which really helps. During procedures, he constantly checks for patient comfort and gives clear, lucid instructions. 

Dr Gandhi seems extremely adept at his work, is quick and efficient.  Plus he is heedful of appointments,  I never had to wait unnecessarily. 

Assistant doctors, consultants and staff in office (e.g. Ms Helen) also very courteous and responsive, and great with follow-up.

Excellent ambience in the clinic, a pleasure to have been there.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Nishant Gandhi made my root canal experience extremely painless & worth it. As someone whose pain tolerance is really low, I was extremely scared to get the RCT done but Dr. Gandhi not only made me comfortable but also took special care of my fear towards injections. The treatment was a 100% painless after the anaesthesia. The procedure was completed in just 10 minutes & was a success. Would highly recommended Dr. Nishant Gandhi for all your dental problems. He‚Äôs cooperative, understanding, patient & knows his job well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Nishant Gandhi is a experience doctor in all of dental treatments but as specially he is a expert in root canal treatment ü¶∑ he is good endodontics. they gives painless root canal treatment. I done my root canal treatment done here for 4 teeth. which is all done painlessly. when I visit here 1st time I was very scared.. but Dr Nishant feels me fearlessness. The way he is understands my fear and make me comfortable for treatment and explaining me about treatment how they will be doing, that is very appritiating.. After completed my treatments I was left the clinic with smiley face. Very trusted Doctor ever. I recommend this 'Dental Surgeon Planet' dental clinic for everyone who needs dental treatments. I had very severe tooth ache, when i visited him, * ***** *** **** ************* *** explained a problem in detail!  On this experience i agree to do RCT treatment immediately with his very soft handed without pain treatment and i wondered he finished in 15 minutes time completely. and i wont had pain after that ever.

Initially i got doubt that how come RCT can complete in 15 minutes as i did before also which continue for 7 seatings for one tooth and he completed in 15 minutes so after RCT, i asked him my reports and X-rays, he gave me and i checked with another Doctor. and another doctor guided who did this as this doctor did inch perfect RCT. From that day we whole family prefer only his treatment!!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
I had gone for a first ever RCT treatment and I was terrified of the pain. I am really happy to say that the procedure was super fast and nearly painless after the anaesthesia injection.
Overall it‚Äôs a 3 sitting RCT where first visit is the actual RCT process, 2nd visit is to take the crown impression and third is to fit the crown.
Everything was fast for me and happened in 3 days.
Post treatment effect is yet to be seen but I am positive and recommend the doctor:)

Most seamless dental experience ever. I have childhood trauma regarding dental issues. However, Dr Nishant and Dr Ankita along with the entire staff made it look effortless in fixing my tooth. RCT was done in one sitting. All the medical requirements were explained in detail - "what ifs" were answered without hesitation. The appointments were done on time. Most importantly, there was no delay or waiting at the clinic. Immensely satisfied with the entire process - right from consultation, in-chamber experience, and post-treatment follow-ups.

Visited Dr. Gandhi for my Father's consultation who was having severe pain and sensation in his right molar tooth. Father wanted to extract the tooth and get done with the pain but doctor rightly guided and suggested how great the tooth is positioned and is very much in good health except it's extreme sensitiveness and suggested to go for RCT to save the tooth. Great experience and consultation. Would definately recommend him to my people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor agreed to see me even though it was a holiday as a first time patient because I was experiencing acute pain. He took the time to examine and give me temporary treatment to alleviate the pain. He was extremely understanding and caring. Doctor Gandhi also arranged for an oral surgeon to come within 48 hours and carry out a wisdom tooth extraction. 5 stars for friendliness, being on time and timely treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Thank you doctor ,im really grateful to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.  Nishant is very friendly *** *************  I needed to see him immediately as the brace wire was sticking out needed to be trimmed. Although the scheduled visit for the braces was a week away Dr. Nishant immediately accomodated me the next day to cut the wire and put me out of misery.  It may seem a very simple thing but such courtesies speaks volumes about the person and the standards of the clinic.  I wish the doctor all the very best and God bless you.
